name.baseName: Farmland remediation ; In-situ remediation ; Solidification/stabilization ; Engineering implementation ; Chemical application, mixing, and blending
农田修复;原位修复;钝化修复;工程实施;药剂施加、混合搅拌

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The described industrial process is used for the remediation of heavy metal-contaminated farmland to reduce the bioavailable fractions of cadmium (Cd) and lead (Pb) in the soil by over 70%. This ensures that the concentration levels of Cd and Pb in crops are within acceptable standards, making the land suitable for agricultural use again. The process involves the application of stabilizing agents, specifically zeolite and quicklime, to the polluted site. The stabilizers are spread manually and then mixed into the soil using a wheel rotary tiller (TH554). This in-situ solidification/stabilization technique is specifically designed for an area measuring 16 hectares within Nujiang Prefecture in Yunnan Province, affected by lead-zinc mine pollution.
稳定化修复实施阶段，对污染土进行药剂施撒（为人力运输与撒施），并使用轮式旋耕机TH554对污染场地进行药剂施加。使用的稳定化药剂为海泡石和生石灰。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 云南省怒江州受铅锌矿污染某耕地土壤 污染修复工程

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process is used for the remediation of heavy metal-contaminated farmland to reduce the bioavailable fractions of cadmium (Cd) and lead (Pb) in the soil by over 70%. This ensures that the concentration levels of Cd and Pb in crops are within acceptable standards, making the land suitable for agricultural use again. The process involves the application of stabilizing agents, specifically zeolite and quicklime, to the polluted site. The stabilizers are spread manually and then mixed into the soil using a wheel rotary tiller (TH554). This in-situ solidification/stabilization technique is specifically designed for an area measuring 16 hectares within Nujiang Prefecture in Yunnan Province, affected by lead-zinc mine pollution.
此工业流程用于修复重金属污染的农田，以降低土壤中镉（Cd）和铅（Pb）的有效态分数超过70％，确保作物中Cd和Pb的浓度水平达到可接受的标准，从而使土地再次适合农业使用。该过程包括向污染场地施加稳定剂，具体为海泡石和生石灰。稳定剂手工撒布后，使用轮式旋耕机（TH554）混合到土壤中。此原位固化/稳定化技术专为云南省怒江州受铅锌矿污染的面积为16公顷的区域设计。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 肖萌 et al. 农田污染钝化修复环境影响定量评估方法与案例分析. 中国环境科学 43, 3571–3581 (2023).
肖萌 et al. 农田污染钝化修复环境影响定量评估方法与案例分析. 中国环境科学 43, 3571–3581 (2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for Life Cycle Assessment, ensure that the scope of your study includes the specific conditions related to agricultural lands afflicted by heavy metal pollution due to historical mining activities. The data set is applicable for agricultural remediation projects that entail in-situ soil stabilization, particularly for lands that have comparable heavy metal contamination as the subject area in Yunnan Province. It is necessary to account for the manual application of agents and subsequent mechanical blending as part of the process. The effectiveness and environmental impact are heavily dependent on the correct application rate and thoroughness of soil mixing. For complete accuracy, users must also consider the soil type, climate conditions, and long-term stability of the remediation technique.

在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，确保您的研究范围包括由于历史采矿活动导致重金属污染的农业土地的具体条件。该数据集适用于需要原位土壤稳定化的农业修复项目，尤其是对于具有与云南省受影响区域相似重金属污染的土地。必须将药剂的手动施用和随后的机械混合作为过程的一部分进行账目处理。稳定化的效果和环境影响很大程度上取决于药剂施用率的正确性和土壤混合的彻底性。为了获得完整的准确性，用户还必须考虑土壤类型、气候条件以及修复技术的长期稳定性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Soil passivation by sepiolite and quicklime

exchange.generalComment: 使用海泡石、生石灰钝化后的农田土壤
